attributes.action: Stop kier Starmer taking us back into the EU via the back door
attributes.additional_details: We as a nation voted to leave as the EU laws never suited us , we asked for them to be changed but was refused, we then voted to leave via BREXIT and the outcome was to do so. In doing so we ALL expected to have our own laws allowing us to decide freely on the destiny of our great Britain....NOT to have others in decide for us for they will NEVER decide in OUR favour .
attributes.background: The British voted to leave the EU completely , not simply change the hand that it is tied to the EU with. We want our own rules and our own laws NOW .
